Software Licences Explained #

Licenses are responses to historical pressures, not abstract ideologies. üëâ It’s basically choosing a social contract, not a legal detail.

TLDR #

  • MIT ‚Üí Freedom without obligations
  • Apache 2.0 ‚Üí Freedom with legal safety
  • GPL ‚Üí Freedom with reciprocity
